blocks.name: nmopval
blocks.content: Value of the norm of a Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmopval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, chba, chba), wceq(cfv(cnop, c0), csup(cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))), cxr, clt)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmptmap(hs0, c0, chba, chba, cnop, csup(cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))), cxr, clt), csup(cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), cxr, clt))
  supex(cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  ax-hilex()
  supeq1d(cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), cxr, clt, cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  rexbidv(s1, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-nmop(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(csup(cab(s0, wrex(s1, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))), cxr, clt))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmopval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : ~H → ~H)→(normop ` c0)= sup({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1))))}, ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmptmap(hs0, c0, chba, chba, cnop, sup({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1))))}, ℝ*, <), sup({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(hs0 ` s1))))}, ℝ*, <))
  supex({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1))))}, cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  ax-hilex()
  supeq1d({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(hs0 ` s1))))}, cxr, clt, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1))))}, hs0 = c0)
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(hs0 ` s1)))), ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, chba, hs0 = c0, ((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(hs0 ` s1))), ((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1))))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, (normh ` s1)[≤]1, s0 =(normh `(hs0 ` s1)), s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1)))
  eqeq2d(s0, (normh `(hs0 ` s1)), (normh `(c0 ` s1)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cno, (hs0 ` s1), (c0 ` s1), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s1)
  df-nmop(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(sup({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s1)[≤]1 ∧ s0 =(normh `(c0 ` s1))))}, ℝ*, <))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: elcnop
blocks.content: Property defining a continuous Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm elcnop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccop), wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, ccop), wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)))))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, chba)), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)))))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccop, co(chba, cmap, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, chba, crp, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))), wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))
  rexralbidv(s2, s3, crp, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))), wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)))
  breq1d(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1), cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s3))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  df-cnop(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, chba)), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  elmap(c0, chba, chba)
  ax-hilex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(chba, cmap, chba))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elcnop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ContOp ↔((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1)))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ ContOp, ((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1)))))), (c0 ∈(~H[↦]~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1)))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccop, (~H[↦]~H), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1))))), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((hs0 ` s3)[-h](hs0 ` s0)))[<]s1))))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, chba, crp, hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((hs0 ` s3)[-h](hs0 ` s0)))[<]s1))), ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1))))
  rexralbidv(s2, s3, crp, chba, hs0 = c0, ((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((hs0 ` s3)[-h](hs0 ` s0)))[<]s1), ((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, (normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2, (normh `((hs0 ` s3)[-h](hs0 ` s0)))[<]s1, (normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1)
  breq1d((normh `((hs0 ` s3)[-h](hs0 ` s0))), clt, s1, (normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0))), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cno, ((hs0 ` s3)[-h](hs0 ` s0)), ((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((hs0 ` s3), cmv, (hs0 ` s0), (c0 ` s3), (c0 ` s0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s3)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s0)
  df-cnop(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(~H[↦]~H), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1))))), (c0 : ~H → ~H))
  elmap(c0, chba, chba)
  ax-hilex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((~H[↦]~H))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s3[-h]s0))[<]s2 →(normh `((c0 ` s3)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: ellnop
blocks.content: Property defining a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm ellnop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, clo), wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, clo), wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, chba)), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clo, co(chba, cmap, chba), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, cc, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wral(s2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2))))))
  ralbidv(s2, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2)))
  oveq12d(co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cfv(c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), csm, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))

thm elunop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuo), wa(wfo(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cuo), wa(wfo(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cuo)
  adantr(wfo(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylancl(wfo(c0, chba, chba), wcel(c0, universe), wf(c0, chba, chba), wcel(chba, universe))
  fof(c0, chba, chba)
  ax-hilex()
  fex(c0, chba, chba, universe)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cuo, wa(wfo(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1)))))), wa(wfo(cv(hs0), chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wfo(cv(hs0), chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1))))), wfo(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1))))))
  foeq1(cv(hs0), c0, chba, chba)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, chba, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1d(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-unop(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfo(c0, chba, chba), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), csp, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

thm elunop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ UniOp ↔((c0 : ~H ↠ ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ∈ UniOp, ((c0 : ~H ↠ ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1)))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, cuo)
  adantr((c0 : ~H ↠ ~H), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancl((c0 : ~H ↠ ~H), c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : ~H → ~H), ~H ∈ 𝕌)
  fof(c0, chba, chba)
  ax-hilex()
  fex(c0, chba, chba, universe)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cuo, ((c0 : ~H ↠ ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1)))), ((hs0 : ~H ↠ ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((hs0 ` s0)[.ih](hs0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 : ~H ↠ ~H), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((hs0 ` s0)[.ih](hs0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1))), (c0 : ~H ↠ ~H), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1))))
  foeq1(hs0, c0, chba, chba)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, chba, chba, hs0 = c0, ((hs0 ` s0)[.ih](hs0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1), ((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1))
  eqeq1d(((hs0 ` s0)[.ih](hs0 ` s1)), (s0[.ih]s1), ((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((hs0 ` s0), csp, (hs0 ` s1), (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s1), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s1)
  df-unop(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 : ~H ↠ ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih](c0 ` s1))=(s0[.ih]s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  2ralbidv(s0, s1, chba, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  oveq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  df-hmop(hs0, s0, s1)
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, chba)), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1))))), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  elmap(c0, chba, chba)
  ax-hilex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(chba, cmap, chba))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)

  df-hmop(hs0, s0, s1)

  syl((c0 : ~H → ℂ), sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, { hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))} ⊆ ℝ*)
  syl6ss({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, cxr, cr, (c0 : ~H → ℂ))
  nmfnsetre(hs1, hs0, c0)
  ressxr()
  supxrcl({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))})
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nmfnrepnf

thm nmfnrepnf(class c0) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, chba, cc), wb(wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr), wne(cfv(cnmf, c0), cpnf)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wf(c0, chba, cc), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr), wne(cfv(cnmf, c0), cpnf), wcel(csup(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cxr, clt), cr), wne(csup(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cxr, clt), cpnf))
  sylancl(wf(c0, chba, cc), wb(wcel(csup(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cxr, clt), cr), wne(csup(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cxr, clt), cpnf)), wss(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cr), wne(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), emptycls))
  nmfnsetre(hs1, hs0, c0)
  ne0ii(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, c0v)))
  nmfnsetn0(hs1, hs0, c0)
  supxrre2(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))))
  eleq1d(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr, csup(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cxr, clt), wf(c0, chba, cc))
  neeq1d(cfv(cnmf, c0), cpnf, csup(cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cxr, clt), wf(c0, chba, cc))
  nmfnval(hs1, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm nmfnrepnf(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : ~H → ℂ)→((normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ ↔(normfn ` c0)≠ +∞))
} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 : ~H → ℂ), (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ, (normfn ` c0)≠ +∞, sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <)≠ +∞)
  sylancl((c0 : ~H → ℂ), (sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ ↔ sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <)≠ +∞), { hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))} ⊆ ℝ, { hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))} ≠ ∅)
  nmfnsetre(hs1, hs0, c0)
  ne0ii({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, (abs `(c0 ` 0h)))
  nmfnsetn0(hs1, hs0, c0)
  supxrre2({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))})
  eleq1d((normfn ` c0), cr, sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <), (c0 : ~H → ℂ))
  neeq1d((normfn ` c0), cpnf, sup({ hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs1 =(abs `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <), (c0 : ~H → ℂ))
  nmfnval(hs1, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nlfnval
blocks.content: Value of the null space of a Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nlfnval(class c0) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, chba, cc), wceq(cfv(cnl, c0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0))))
} = {
  sylbir(wf(c0, chba, cc), wceq(cfv(cnl, c0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0))), wcel(c0, co(cc, cmap, chba)))
  elmap(c0, cc, chba)
  cnex()
  ax-hilex()
  mpdan(wcel(c0, co(cc, cmap, chba)), wceq(cfv(cnl, c0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0)), universe))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(cc, cmap, chba)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0)), universe), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe))
  cnvexg(c0, co(cc, cmap, chba))
  imaexg(ccnv(c0), universe, csn(nat0))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, co(cc, cmap, chba), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0)), universe, cnl, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0)))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0), ccnv(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-nlfn(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cc, cmap, chba))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(nat0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nlfnval(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : ~H → ℂ)→(null ` c0)=(`' c0 " { 0 }))
} = {
  sylbir((c0 : ~H → ℂ), (null ` c0)=(`' c0 " { 0 }), c0 ∈(ℂ[↦]~H))
  elmap(c0, cc, chba)
  cnex()
  ax-hilex()
  mpdan(c0 ∈(ℂ[↦]~H), (null ` c0)=(`' c0 " { 0 }), (`' c0 " { 0 })∈ 𝕌)
  syl(c0 ∈(ℂ[↦]~H), (`' c0 " { 0 })∈ 𝕌, `' c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  cnvexg(c0, (ℂ[↦]~H))
  imaexg(`' c0, universe, { 0 })
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, (ℂ[↦]~H), (`' c0 " { 0 }), universe, cnl, (`' hs0 " { 0 }))
  imaeq1d(`' hs0, { 0 }, `' c0, hs0 = c0)
  cnveq(hs0, c0)
  df-nlfn(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((ℂ[↦]~H))
  diff.hs0.c((`' c0 " { 0 }))
}

  rexralbidv(s2, s3, crp, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))), wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)))

  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))

  anbi1i(wcel(c0, co(cc, cmap, chba)), wral(s0, chba, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))), wf(c0, chba, cc))
  elmap(c0, cc, chba)

  ax-hilex()

  eqeq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), cfv(c0, co(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), cva, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  oveq12d(co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cfv(c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

thm dfadj2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cado, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wf(cv(s0), chba, chba), wf(cv(s1), chba, chba), wral(s2, chba, wral(s3, chba, wceq(co(cv(s2), csp, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3))), co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), csp, cv(s3))))))))

  ⊢ ContFn =(c0[Cn]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(normh ∘ -h)

  ⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(ccnfn, (c0[Cn]c1), { hs3 ∈(ℂ[↦]~H)| ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs4 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[<]hs2 →(abs `((hs3 ` hs0)[-](hs3 ` hs1)))[<]hs4)))))}, { hs3 |(hs3 ∈(ℂ[↦]~H)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs4 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[<]hs2 →(abs `((hs3 ` hs0)[-](hs3 ` hs1)))[<]hs4))))))})

blocks.name: dmadjrnb
blocks.content: The adjoint of an operator belongs to the adjoint function's domain. (Note: the converse is dependent on our definition of function value, since it uses ~ ndmfv .) (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmadjrnb(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cdm(cado)))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cdm(cado)))
  dmadjrn(c0)
  con4i(wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cdm(cado)), wcel(c0, cdm(cado)))
  mtbiri(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cado))), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cdm(cado)), wcel(emptycls, cdm(cado)))
  mto(wcel(emptycls, cdm(cado)), wf(emptycls, chba, chba))
  mto(wf(emptycls, chba, chba), wceq(cdm(emptycls), chba))
  mtbir(wceq(cdm(emptycls), chba), wceq(emptycls, chba))
  mtbir(wceq(emptycls, chba), wceq(chba, emptycls))
  n0ii(chba, c0v)
  ax-hv0cl()
  eqcom(emptycls, chba)
  eqeq1i(cdm(emptycls), chba, emptycls)
  dm0()
  fdm(emptycls, chba, chba)
  dmadjop(emptycls)
  eleq1d(cfv(cado, c0), cdm(cado), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cado))))
  ndmfv(c0, cado)
}

thm dmadjrnb(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(adjh)↔(adjh ` c0)∈ dom(adjh))
} = {
  impbii(c0 ∈ dom(adjh), (adjh ` c0)∈ dom(adjh))
  dmadjrn(c0)
  con4i((adjh ` c0)∈ dom(adjh), c0 ∈ dom(adjh))
  mtbiri(¬ c0 ∈ dom(adjh), (adjh ` c0)∈ dom(adjh), ∅ ∈ dom(adjh))
  mto(∅ ∈ dom(adjh), (∅ : ~H → ~H))
  mto((∅ : ~H → ~H), dom(∅)= ~H)
  mtbir(dom(∅)= ~H, ∅ = ~H)
  mtbir(∅ = ~H, ~H = ∅)
  n0ii(chba, c0v)
  ax-hv0cl()
  eqcom(emptycls, chba)
  eqeq1i(dom(∅), chba, emptycls)
  dm0()
  fdm(emptycls, chba, chba)
  dmadjop(emptycls)
  eleq1d((adjh ` c0), dom(adjh), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(adjh))
  ndmfv(c0, cado)
}

  sylan((c0 : ~H → ~H), c1 ∈ ℝ*, (sup({ hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s0)[≤]1 ∧ hs0 =(normh `(c0 ` s0))))}, ℝ*, <)[≤]c1 ↔ ∀(hs1 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s0)[≤]1 ∧ hs0 =(normh `(c0 ` s0))))}, hs1[≤]c1)), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s0)[≤]1 ∧ hs0 =(normh `(c0 ` s0))))} ⊆ ℝ*)

  nmopsetretALT(hs0, s0, c0)
  ressxr()

  ralab(hs1, hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` s0)[≤]1 ∧ hs0 =(normh `(c0 ` s0)))), hs1[≤]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ~H,(hs1 =(normh `(c0 ` s0))∧(normh ` s0)[≤]1)))

blocks.content: An upper bound for an operator norm. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmopub2tHIL(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, chba, chba), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c1)), wral(s0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s0)))))), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nmoub2i(s0, c0, chba, chba, c1, cno, cno, cnop, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  df-hba()
  hhnm(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  hhnmoi(co(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cnmoo, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  eqid(co(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cnmoo, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  hhnv(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  eqid(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cop(cva, csm), cno)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cva, csm)
  diff.cva.s(s0)
  diff.csm.s(s0)
  diff.cno.s(s0)
}

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {

blocks.name: nmopgt0

  syl5(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(c0, clo), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c3))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, chba, wral(hs2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, clo), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, chba, wral(hs2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))))), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  ellnop(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  rspc3v(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cc, c2, chba, c3, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, csm, cv(hs1))

thm unop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(c1, csp, c2)))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(c1, csp, c2)), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1))))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cuo), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1))))), wfo(c0, chba, chba))
  elunop(hs0, hs1, c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wi(wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1))))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(c1, csp, c2))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, chba, c2, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(c1, csp, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(c1, csp, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(c1, csp, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)

  oveq2d(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c1, csp)

thm unop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UniOp ∧ c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c2 ∈ ~H)→((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` c2))=(c1[.ih]c2))
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ UniOp ∧ c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c2 ∈ ~H), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` c2))=(c1[.ih]c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` hs0)[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=(hs0[.ih]hs1))))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ UniOp, c1 ∈ ~H, c2 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` hs0)[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=(hs0[.ih]hs1))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ UniOp, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` hs0)[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=(hs0[.ih]hs1))), (c0 : ~H ↠ ~H))
  elunop(hs0, hs1, c0)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ UniOp, c1 ∈ ~H, c2 ∈ ~H, (∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` hs0)[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=(hs0[.ih]hs1)))→((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` c2))=(c1[.ih]c2)))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, chba, c2, chba, ((c0 ` hs0)[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=(hs0[.ih]hs1), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` c2))=(c1[.ih]c2), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=(c1[.ih]hs1))
  eqeq12d(((c0 ` hs0)[.ih](c0 ` hs1)), (hs0[.ih]hs1), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` hs1)), (c1[.ih]hs1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1d((c0 ` hs0), csp, (c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, csp, hs1)
  eqeq12d(((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` hs1)), (c1[.ih]hs1), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` c2)), (c1[.ih]c2), hs1 = c2)
  oveq2d((c0 ` c1), csp, (c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` c2), hs1 = c2)
  fveq2(hs1, c2, c0)

  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ` c1)[.ih](c0 ` c2))=(c1[.ih]c2))
}

thm unopf1o(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuo), wf1o(c0, chba, chba))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cuo), wf1o(c0, chba, chba), wf1(c0, chba, chba), wfo(c0, chba, chba))
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cuo), wf1(c0, chba, chba), wf(c0, chba, chba), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, chba, chba, wcel(c0, cuo), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cuo), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: unopnorm
blocks.content: A unitary operator is idempotent in the norm. (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  3anidm23(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c1)), co(c1, csp, c1)))
  unop(c0, c1, c1)

blocks.name: cnvunop
blocks.content: The inverse (converse) of a unitary operator in Hilbert space is unitary. Theorem in [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 72. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm cnvunop(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(ccnv(c0), cuo))

  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(ccnv(c0), cuo), wfo(ccnv(c0), chba, chba), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1))))))

  fof(ccnv(c0), chba, chba)

  syl((c0 : ~H ↔ ~H), (`' c0 : ~H ↠ ~H), (`' c0 : ~H ↔ ~H))

blocks.name: unopadj
blocks.content: The inverse (converse) of a unitary operator is its adjoint. Equation 2 of [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 72. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm unopadj(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  eqtr3d(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c2), co(c1, csp, cfv(ccnv(c0), c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, cfv(ccnv(c0), c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))

  3adant2(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c0), c2), chba))
  ffvelrnda(c2, chba, ccnv(c0), chba, wcel(c0, cuo))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cuo), wf(ccnv(c0), chba, chba), wf1o(c0, chba, chba), wf1o(ccnv(c0), chba, chba))

blocks.name: counop
blocks.content: The composition of two unitary operators is unitary. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  syl2an((c0 ∈ UniOp ∧ c1 ∈ UniOp), (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H), ((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)=(c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), (c1 : ~H → ~H), hs0 ∈ ~H)

  fvco3(c1, chba, chba, hs0, c0)

  unop(c0, (c1 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs1))

  elhmop(hs0, hs1, c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wi(wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1))))), wceq(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c2))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, chba, c2, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c2)), wceq(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cv(hs1))))

  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  eqeq12d(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cv(hs1)), co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2d(c1, csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)

  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, chba, c2, chba, (hs0[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1), (c1[.ih](c0 ` c2))=((c0 ` c1)[.ih]c2), (c1[.ih](c0 ` hs1))=((c0 ` c1)[.ih]hs1))
  eqeq12d((hs0[.ih](c0 ` hs1)), ((c0 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1), (c1[.ih](c0 ` hs1)), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih]hs1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, csp, (c0 ` hs1))

  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  eqeq12d((c1[.ih](c0 ` hs1)), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih]hs1), (c1[.ih](c0 ` c2)), ((c0 ` c1)[.ih]c2), hs1 = c2)
  oveq2d(c1, csp, (c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` c2), hs1 = c2)

thm cnfnc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ContFn ∧ c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ ContFn, c1 ∈ ~H, c2 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2))))
  syl5com(c0 ∈ ContFn, (c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]hs0))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0)))[<]hs1))))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ ContFn, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]hs0))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0)))[<]hs1))))), (c0 : ~H → ℂ))
  elcnfn(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, chba, c2, crp, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]hs0))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0)))[<]hs1))), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2))), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]hs1))))
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, crp, chba, hs0 = c1, ((normh `(s1[-h]hs0))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0)))[<]hs1), ((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]hs1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, (normh `(s1[-h]hs0))[<]s0, (abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0)))[<]hs1, (normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0, (abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]hs1)
  breq1d((normh `(s1[-h]hs0)), clt, s0, (normh `(s1[-h]c1)), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(cno, (s1[-h]hs0), (s1[-h]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, s1, cmv)
  breq1d((abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0))), clt, hs1, (abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1))), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(cabs, ((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` hs0)), ((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2d((c0 ` s1), cmin, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, crp, chba, hs1 = c2, ((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]hs1), ((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2))
  imbi2d(hs1 = c2, (normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0, (abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]hs1, (abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2)
  breq2(hs1, c2, (abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1))), clt)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(s1[-h]c1))[<]s0 →(abs `((c0 ` s1)[-](c0 ` c1)))[<]c2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

thm lnfnl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

} = {
  anassrs(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3))))
  impcom(wcel(c0, clf), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3))))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba), wi(wcel(c0, clf), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3)))))
  syl5(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(c0, clf), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, chba, wral(hs2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, clf), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, chba, wral(hs2, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))))), wf(c0, chba, cc))
  ellnfn(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  rspc3v(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cc, c2, chba, c3, chba, wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvoveq1d(c0, co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2), co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, csm, cv(hs1))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))

  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))

  fveq2(cv(hs2), c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(chba)

  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, cv(hs2))), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c3)), co(co(c1, cmul, cfv(c0, c2)), caddc, cfv(c0, c3))))

thm adj1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cado, c0), c1), csp, c2)))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(c1, csp, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cado, c0), c1), csp, c2)))

  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wb(wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), csp, c1), co(cv(s1), csp, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, chba, wceq(co(cv(s1), csp, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), csp, cfv(cfv(cado, c0), c1))))))

  syl5bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(cv(s1), chba)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), csp, c1), co(cv(s1), csp, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s1), csp, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), csp, cfv(cfv(cado, c0), c1))), wceq(co(cv(s1), csp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), csp, c1)))

thm brafval(setvar s0, class c0) {

blocks.name: braval

}

  biimpa((c0 : ~H → ~H), c1 ∈(eigvec ` c0), (c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c1 ≠ 0h ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c0 ` c1)=(hs0[.h]c1))))
  eleigvec(hs0, c0, c1)

  biimpa(c1 ∈ ~H, c1 ≠ 0h, ((normh ` c1)[^]2)≠ 0)

  jca(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wcel(c1, cfv(cei, c0))), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), cc)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), csm, c1)), wne(c1, c0v)))

  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cfv(cei, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cei, c0)), wne(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), cc), wcel(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c2), cc))))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cfv(cei, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cei, c0))), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), cc), wcel(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c2), cc)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cfv(cei, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cei, c0))), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba))

  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cfv(cei, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cei, c0)), wne(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c2)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), csm, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c2), csm, c2))))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cfv(cei, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cei, c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c1), csm, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cel, c0), c2), csm, c2)))

  syl(wcel(c0, clo), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c0v), cmv, cfv(c0, c0v)), c0v), wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), chba))
  hvsubid(cfv(c0, c0v))
  syl(wcel(c0, clo), wceq(co(co(cfv(c0, c0v), cva, cfv(c0, c0v)), cmv, cfv(c0, c0v)), cfv(c0, c0v)), wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), chba))
  syl(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), chba), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  lnopf(c0)
  mpan2(wf(c0, chba, chba), wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), chba), wcel(c0v, chba))
  ax-hv0cl()
  ffvelrn(c0, chba, chba, c0v)
  anidms(wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), chba), wceq(co(co(cfv(c0, c0v), cva, cfv(c0, c0v)), cmv, cfv(c0, c0v)), cfv(c0, c0v)))
  hvpncan(cfv(c0, c0v), cfv(c0, c0v))
}

blocks.name: lnopmul
blocks.content: Multiplicative property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopmul(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, csm, c2)), co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c0, co(c1, csm, c2)), co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c0v)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c0v)), w3a(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3impa(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c0v)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c0v))))
  mpanr2(wa(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c0v)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c0v))), wcel(c0v, chba))
  ax-hv0cl()
  lnopl(c0, c1, c2, c0v)
  fveq2d(c0, co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c0v), co(c1, csm, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c0v), co(c1, csm, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c1, csm, c2), cva, c0v), co(c1, csm, c2)), wcel(co(c1, csm, c2), chba))
  hvmulcl(c1, c2)
  ax-hvaddid(co(c1, csm, c2))
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c0v)), co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, c0v), w3a(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c0v)), co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, c0v)))
  oveq2d(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, cfv(c0, c0v), c0v, wcel(c0, clo))
  lnop0(c0)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), cva, c0v), co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2))), wcel(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), chba))
  3com12(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), chba))
  3impb(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), chba))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c2, chba)), wcel(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)), chba), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), chba))
  ffvelrnda(c2, chba, c0, chba, wcel(c0, clo))
  lnopf(c0)
  hvmulcl(c1, cfv(c0, c2))
  ax-hvaddid(co(c1, csm, cfv(c0, c2)))
}

blocks.name: lnopli
blocks.content: Basic scalar product property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnopfi
blocks.content: A linear Hilbert space operator is a Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnop0i
blocks.content: The value of a linear Hilbert space operator at zero is zero. Remark in [Beran] p. 99. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnopaddi
blocks.content: Additive property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopaddi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), cva, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, clo)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), cva, cfv(c2, c1)), cfv(c2, co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1)), co(co(nat1, csm, cfv(c2, c0)), cva, cfv(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(c2, co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1)), co(co(nat1, csm, cfv(c2, c0)), cva, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  lnopli(nat1, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(c2, co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1)), cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, c1))))
  fvoveq1d(c2, co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1, c0, wcel(c0, chba))
  ax-hvmulid(c0)
  oveq1d(co(nat1, csm, cfv(c2, c0)), cva, cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(nat1, csm, cfv(c2, c0)), cfv(c2, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(nat1, csm, cfv(c2, c0)), cfv(c2, c0)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), chba))
  ffvelrni(c0, chba, c2, chba)
  lnopfi(c2)
  ax-hvmulid(cfv(c2, c0))
}

blocks.name: lnopmuli

blocks.name: lnopaddmuli
blocks.content: Sum/product property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopaddmuli(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cva, co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2)))))
  -| wcel(c3, clo)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cva, co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cva, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cva, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))))
  3impb(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cva, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, chba), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cva, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))), wcel(co(c0, csm, c2), chba))
  hvmulcl(c0, c2)
  lnopaddi(c1, co(c0, csm, c2), c3)
  oveq2d(cfv(c3, c1), cva, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2))))
  lnopmuli(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: lnopsubi
blocks.content: Subtraction property for a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopsubi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(c0, cmv, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), cmv, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, clo)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c2, co(c0, cmv, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), cmv, cfv(c2, c1)), cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))), co(cfv(c2, c0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cfv(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))), co(cfv(c2, c0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cfv(c2, c1)))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  lnopaddmuli(cneg(nat1), c0, c1, c2)
  fveq2d(c2, co(c0, cmv, c1), co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  hvsubval(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(cfv(c2, c0), cmv, cfv(c2, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cfv(c2, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), chba), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), chba))
  ffvelrni(c0, chba, c2, chba)
  ffvelrni(c1, chba, c2, chba)
  lnopfi(c2)
  hvsubval(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, c1))
}

blocks.name: lnopsubmuli
blocks.content: Subtraction/product property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopsubmuli(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cmv, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2)))))
  -| wcel(c3, clo)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, co(c1, cmv, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cmv, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))))
  3impb(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cmv, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, chba), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cmv, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))), wcel(co(c0, csm, c2), chba))
  hvmulcl(c0, c2)
  lnopsubi(c1, co(c0, csm, c2), c3)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2)))))
  oveq2d(cfv(c3, c1), cmv, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(c0, csm, cfv(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba)))
  lnopmuli(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: homco2
blocks.content: Move a scalar product out of a composition of operators. The operator ` T ` must be linear, unlike ~ homco1 that works for any operators. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm homco2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wceq(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2))))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wceq(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2))), wral(hs0, chba, wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), cv(hs0))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(co(c0, chot, c2), cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, co(c0, csm, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)))
  fveq2d(c1, cfv(co(c0, chot, c2), cv(hs0)), co(c0, csm, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, chot, c2), cv(hs0)), co(c0, csm, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cc), wf(c2, chba, chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  homval(c0, c2, cv(hs0))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(co(c0, chot, c2), cv(hs0)))), wf(co(c0, chot, c2), chba, chba))
  fvco3(co(c0, chot, c2), chba, chba, cv(hs0), c1)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, co(c0, csm, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), co(c0, csm, cfv(ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0))), co(c0, csm, cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)))
  oveq2d(c0, csm, cfv(ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wf(c2, chba, chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  fvco3(c2, chba, chba, cv(hs0), c1)
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)), co(c0, csm, cfv(ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cc), wf(ccom(c1, c2), chba, chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wf(ccom(c1, c2), chba, chba))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  homval(c0, ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(cfv(c1, co(c0, csm, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), co(c0, csm, cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, clo), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), chba))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), chba, c2, chba, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)))
  lnopmul(c1, c0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wb(wral(hs0, chba, wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)))), wceq(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)))), wf(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), chba, chba), wf(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), chba, chba))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wf(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(co(c0, chot, c2), chba, chba))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba), wf(co(c0, chot, c2), chba, chba))
  homulcl(c0, c2)
  fco(c1, chba, chba, co(c0, chot, c2), chba)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wf(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)), chba, chba), wcel(c0, cc), wf(ccom(c1, c2), chba, chba))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wf(ccom(c1, c2), chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(c2, chba, chba))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba))
  lnopf(c1)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba))
  fco(c1, chba, chba, c2, chba)
  homulcl(c0, ccom(c1, c2))
  hoeq(hs0, ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)), co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, clo), wf(c2, chba, chba)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c1, co(c0, chot, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, chot, ccom(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm homco2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: nmop0h

thm lnophdi(class c0, class c1) {

  honegsubi(c0, c1)

thm lnopeq0lem1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, c2), co(co(co(co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), csp, co(c1, cva, c2)), cmin, co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cmv, c2)), csp, co(c1, cmv, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, co(co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cva, co(ci, csm, c2))), csp, co(c1, cva, co(ci, csm, c2))), cmin, co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cmv, co(ci, csm, c2))), csp, co(c1, cmv, co(ci, csm, c2)))))), cdiv, nat4))

  oveq12i(co(co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), csp, co(c1, cva, c2)), cmin, co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cmv, c2)), csp, co(c1, cmv, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, co(co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cva, co(ci, csm, c2))), csp, co(c1, cva, co(ci, csm, c2))), cmin, co(cfv(c0, co(c1, cmv, co(ci, csm, c2))), csp, co(c1, cmv, co(ci, csm, c2))))), co(co(co(cfv(c0, c1), cva, cfv(c0, c2)), csp, co(c1, cva, c2)), cmin, co(co(cfv(c0, c1), cmv, cfv(c0, c2)), csp, co(c1, cmv, c2))), co(ci, cmul, co(co(co(cfv(c0, c1), cva, co(ci, csm, cfv(c0, c2))), csp, co(c1, cva, co(ci, csm, c2))), cmin, co(co(cfv(c0, c1), cmv, co(ci, csm, cfv(c0, c2))), csp, co(c1, cmv, co(ci, csm, c2))))))

blocks.name: lnopeq0i
blocks.content: A condition implying that a linear Hilbert space operator is identically zero. Unlike ~ ho01i for arbitrary operators, when the operator is linear we need to consider only the values of the quadratic form ` ( T `` x ) .ih x ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: lnopunii

blocks.name: unopbd
blocks.content: A unitary operator is a bounded linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm unopbd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c0, cbo))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, clo), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr))
  unoplin(c0)
  pm2.61ian(wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wceq(chba, c0h))
  sylan2(wceq(chba, c0h), wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuo), wf(c0, chba, chba), wf1o(c0, chba, chba))
  unopf1o(c0)
  f1of(c0, chba, chba)
  syl6eqel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr, nat0, wa(wceq(chba, c0h), wf(c0, chba, chba)))
  nmop0h(c0)
  0re()
  sylanbr(wn(wceq(chba, c0h)), wcel(c0, cuo), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wne(chba, c0h))
  df-ne(chba, c0h)
  syl6eqel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr, nat1, wa(wne(chba, c0h), wcel(c0, cuo)))
  nmopun(c0)
  1re()
  elbdop2(c0)
}

thm unopbd(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ UniOp → c0 ∈ BndLinOp)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ UniOp, c0 ∈ BndLinOp, c0 ∈ LinOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  unoplin(c0)
  pm2.61ian(c0 ∈ UniOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ, ~H = 0H)
  sylan2(~H = 0H, c0 ∈ UniOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ, (c0 : ~H → ~H))
  syl(c0 ∈ UniOp, (c0 : ~H → ~H), (c0 : ~H ↔ ~H))
  unopf1o(c0)
  f1of(c0, chba, chba)
  syl6eqel((normop ` c0), cr, nat0, (~H = 0H ∧(c0 : ~H → ~H)))
  nmop0h(c0)
  0re()
  sylanbr(¬ ~H = 0H, c0 ∈ UniOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ, ~H ≠ 0H)

  nmopun(c0)
  1re()
  elbdop2(c0)
}

thm lnophmlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wcel(co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), cr), wcel(c2, chba))
  a1ii(wcel(co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), cr), wcel(c1, clo))
  a1ii(wcel(co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), cr), diffsc(s0, c2))
  mp2(wcel(co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), cr), wcel(c0, chba), wral(s0, chba, wcel(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cr)))
  rspcv(s0, c0, chba, wcel(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cr), wcel(co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), cr))
  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cr, co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq12d(cv(s0), csp, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c0, cfv(c1, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0)), cr)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csp, cfv(c1, c0))
  diff.csp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

thm lnophmlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[.ih](c1 ` c0))∈ ℝ

} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), (c0[.op]c1)∈ HrmOp, ((c0[.op]c1): ~H → ~H), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,(hs0[.ih]((c0[.op]c1)` hs1))=(((c0[.op]c1)` hs0)[.ih]hs1))))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ HrmOp, ((c0[.op]c1): ~H → ~H), c0 ∈ ℂ, (c1 : ~H → ~H))
  homulcl(c0, c1)
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, chba, chba, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), (hs0[.ih]((c0[.op]c1)` hs1))=(((c0[.op]c1)` hs0)[.ih]hs1))
  3eqtr4d((hs0[.ih]((c0[.op]c1)` hs1)), (((c0[.op]c1)` hs0)[.ih]hs1), ((* ` c0)[×](hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1))), (c0[×]((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1)), ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp)∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)))
  anassrs(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ HrmOp, (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H), ((* ` c0)[×](hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1)))=(c0[×]((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1)))
  oveqan12d((* ` c0), cmul, (hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1)), c0, ((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1), c0 ∈ ℝ, (c1 ∈ HrmOp ∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)))
  cjre(c0)
  3expb(c1 ∈ HrmOp, hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H, (hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1))=((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1))
  hmop(c1, hs0, hs1)
  sylan((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H), (hs0[.ih]((c0[.op]c1)` hs1))=((* ` c0)[×](hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1))), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H)))
  eqtrd((hs0[.ih]((c0[.op]c1)` hs1)), ((* ` c0)[×](hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1))), (hs0[.ih](c0[.h](c1 ` hs1))), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)))
  oveq2d(hs0, csp, ((c0[.op]c1)` hs1), (c0[.h](c1 ` hs1)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)))
  adantrl((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H)), hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H, ((c0[.op]c1)` hs1)=(c0[.h](c1 ` hs1)))
  3expa(c0 ∈ ℂ, (c1 : ~H → ~H), hs1 ∈ ~H, ((c0[.op]c1)` hs1)=(c0[.h](c1 ` hs1)))
  homval(c0, c1, hs1)
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)), (hs0[.ih](c0[.h](c1 ` hs1)))=((* ` c0)[×](hs0[.ih](c1 ` hs1))), c0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ~H, (c1 ` hs1)∈ ~H)
  simprl((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H)), hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H)
  ad2ant2l(c0 ∈ ℂ, (c1 : ~H → ~H), hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H, (c1 ` hs1)∈ ~H)
  ffvelrn(c1, chba, chba, hs1)
  his5(c0, hs0, (c1 ` hs1))
  sylan((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H), (((c0[.op]c1)` hs0)[.ih]hs1)=(c0[×]((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H)))
  anim12i(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ HrmOp, c0 ∈ ℂ, (c1 : ~H → ~H))
  recn(c0)
  hmopf(c1)
  eqtrd((((c0[.op]c1)` hs0)[.ih]hs1), (c0[×]((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1)), ((c0[.h](c1 ` hs0))[.ih]hs1), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)))

  homval(c0, c1, hs0)
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧(hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)), ((c0[.h](c1 ` hs0))[.ih]hs1)=(c0[×]((c1 ` hs0)[.ih]hs1)), c0 ∈ ℂ, (c1 ` hs0)∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H)

blocks.name: hmopd
blocks.content: The difference of two Hermitian operators is Hermitian. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hmopd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wcel(co(c0, chod, c1), cho))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, chod, c1), cho, co(c0, chos, co(cneg(nat1), chot, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho), wceq(co(c0, chos, co(cneg(nat1), chot, c1)), co(c0, chod, c1)), wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba))
  hmopf(c0)
  hmopf(c1)
  honegsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho), wcel(co(c0, chos, co(cneg(nat1), chot, c1)), cho), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), chot, c1), cho))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cho), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), chot, c1), cho), wcel(cneg(nat1), cr))
  neg1rr()
  hmopm(cneg(nat1), c1)
  hmops(c0, co(cneg(nat1), chot, c1))
}

} = {

  eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(ccom(c1, c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho), wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c1, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))))

  eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccom(c1, c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), csp, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))))
  3eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))))

  oveq2d(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c1, cho), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  sylan(wcel(c1, cho), wcel(cv(hs1), chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wf(c1, chba, chba))
  fvco3(c1, chba, chba, cv(hs1), c0)

  breq12d(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, c1)), cfv(cno, cfv(cif(c0, ch0o, wcel(c0, cbo)), c1)), co(cfv(cnop, cif(c0, ch0o, wcel(c0, cbo))), cmul, cfv(cno, c1)), wceq(c0, cif(c0, ch0o, wcel(c0, cbo))))
  fveq2d(cno, cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cif(c0, ch0o, wcel(c0, cbo)), c1), wceq(c0, cif(c0, ch0o, wcel(c0, cbo))))

thm nmcopexi(class c0) {
  ⊢ (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ
  ⊣ c0 ∈ LinOp
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ContOp
} = {
  nmcexi(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs0, cnop, c0, cno)
  mpbi(∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs2)[<]hs1 →(normh `(c0 ` hs2))[<]1))), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ ~H,((normh `(hs2[-h]0h))[<]hs1 →(normh `((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)))[<]1))))
  mp3an(∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ ~H,((normh `(hs2[-h]0h))[<]hs1 →(normh `((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)))[<]1))), c0 ∈ ContOp, 0h ∈ ~H, 1 ∈ ℝ+)
  ax-hv0cl()
  1rp()
  cnopc(hs1, hs2, c0, c0v, nat1)
  rexbii(hs1, crp, ∀(hs2 ∈ ~H,((normh `(hs2[-h]0h))[<]hs1 →(normh `((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)))[<]1)), ∀(hs2 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs2)[<]hs1 →(normh `(c0 ` hs2))[<]1)))
  ralbiia(hs2, chba, ((normh `(hs2[-h]0h))[<]hs1 →(normh `((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)))[<]1), ((normh ` hs2)[<]hs1 →(normh `(c0 ` hs2))[<]1))
  imbi12d(hs2 ∈ ~H, (normh `(hs2[-h]0h))[<]hs1, (normh `((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)))[<]1, (normh ` hs2)[<]hs1, (normh `(c0 ` hs2))[<]1)
  breq1d((normh `(hs2[-h]0h)), clt, hs1, (normh ` hs2), hs2 ∈ ~H)
  fveq2d(cno, (hs2[-h]0h), hs2, hs2 ∈ ~H)
  hvsub0(hs2)
  breq1d((normh `((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h))), clt, nat1, (normh `(c0 ` hs2)), hs2 ∈ ~H)
  fveq2d(cno, ((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)), (c0 ` hs2), hs2 ∈ ~H)
  syl5eq(((c0 ` hs2)[-h](c0 ` 0h)), (c0 ` hs2), ((c0 ` hs2)[-h]0h), hs2 ∈ ~H)
  oveq2i((c0 ` hs2), cmv, (c0 ` 0h), c0v)

  ffvelrni(hs2, chba, c0, chba)

  ax-mp((normop ` c0)= sup({ hs3 | ∃(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 ∧ hs3 =(normh `(c0 ` hs0))))}, ℝ*, <), (c0 : ~H → ~H))
  nmopval(hs3, hs0, c0)
  syl(hs0 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` hs0))∈ ℝ, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ~H)
  normcl((c0 ` hs0))
  eqtri((normh `(c0 ` 0h)), nat0, (normh ` 0h))
  fveq2i(cno, (c0 ` 0h), c0v)
  lnop0i(c0)
  norm0()
  3eqtrrd(((hs1[÷]2)[×](normh `(c0 ` hs0))), (normh `(c0 `((hs1[÷]2)[.h]hs0))), (normh `((hs1[÷]2)[.h](c0 ` hs0))), ((abs `(hs1[÷]2))[×](normh `(c0 ` hs0))), ((hs1[÷]2)∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H))
  fveq2d(cno, (c0 `((hs1[÷]2)[.h]hs0)), ((hs1[÷]2)[.h](c0 ` hs0)), ((hs1[÷]2)∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H))

blocks.name: nmcoplbi
blocks.content: A lower bound for the norm of a continuous linear operator. Theorem 3.5(ii) of [Beran] p. 99. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wcel(c1, ccop)
} = {

  adantl(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(c0, c0v), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c1, c0)), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c1), cmul, cfv(cno, c0))))
  3brtr4d(cfv(cno, cfv(c1, c0)), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c1), cmul, cfv(cno, c0)), nat0, nat0, wceq(c0, c0v))

  0le0()

  fveq2(c0, c0v, c1)
  lnop0i(c1)

  simpri(wcel(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, cin(clo, ccop))), ccop), wcel(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, cin(clo, ccop))), clo))
  mpbi(wa(wcel(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, cin(clo, ccop))), clo), wcel(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, cin(clo, ccop))), ccop)), wcel(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, cin(clo, ccop))), cin(clo, ccop)))
  elimel(c0, cin(clo, ccop), cres(cid, chba))

thm nmcoplb(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LinOp ∧ c0 ∈ ContOp ∧ c1 ∈ ~H)→(normh `(c0 ` c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1)))
} = {
  3impa(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0 ∈ ContOp, c1 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1)))
  sylanbr((c0 ∈ LinOp ∧ c0 ∈ ContOp), c1 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1)), c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp))
  elin(c0, clo, ccop)
  imp(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c1 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1)))
  dedth(c0, (= |` ~H), c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), (c1 ∈ ~H →(normh `(c0 ` c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1))), (c1 ∈ ~H →(normh `(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))` c1))[≤]((normop ` if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))[×](normh ` c1))))
  imbi2d(c0 = if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)), c1 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1)), (normh `(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))` c1))[≤]((normop ` if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))[×](normh ` c1)))
  breq12d((normh `(c0 ` c1)), cle, ((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` c1)), (normh `(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))` c1)), ((normop ` if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))[×](normh ` c1)), c0 = if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))
  fveq2d(cno, (c0 ` c1), (if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))` c1), c0 = if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))
  fveq1(c0, if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)), c1)
  oveq1d((normop ` c0), cmul, (normh ` c1), (normop ` if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))), c0 = if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))
  fveq2(c0, if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)), cnop)
  nmcoplbi(c1, if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)))
  simpli(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ LinOp, if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ ContOp)
  simpri(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ ContOp, if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ LinOp)
  mpbi((if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ LinOp ∧ if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ ContOp), if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp))
  elimel(c0, (LinOp ⋂ ContOp), (= |` ~H))
  mpbir2an((= |` ~H)∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), (= |` ~H)∈ LinOp, (= |` ~H)∈ ContOp)
  idlnop()
  idcnop()
  elin((= |` ~H), clo, ccop)
  elin(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H)), clo, ccop)
}

blocks.name: bdophmi
blocks.content: The scalar product of a bounded linear operator is a bounded linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bdophmi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, chot, c1), cbo))
  -| wcel(c1, cbo)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, chot, c1), cbo), wcel(co(c0, chot, c1), clo), wcel(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chot, c1)), cr))
  lnopmi(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wcel(c1, clo), wcel(c1, cbo))
  bdopln(c1)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chot, c1)), cr, co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cnop, c1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  nmophmi(c0, c1)
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cnop, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr), wcel(cfv(cnop, c1), cr))
  abscl(c0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cnop, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cbo))
  nmopre(c1)
  remulcl(cfv(cabs, c0), cfv(cnop, c1))
  elbdop2(co(c0, chot, c1))
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(c0[.op]c1)∈ BndLinOp)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ BndLinOp
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ ℂ, (c0[.op]c1)∈ BndLinOp, (c0[.op]c1)∈ LinOp, (normop `(c0[.op]c1))∈ ℝ)
  lnopmi(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(c1 ∈ LinOp, c1 ∈ BndLinOp)
  bdopln(c1)
  eqeltrd((normop `(c0[.op]c1)), cr, ((abs ` c0)[×](normop ` c1)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  nmophmi(c0, c1)
  sylancl(c0 ∈ ℂ, ((abs ` c0)[×](normop ` c1))∈ ℝ, (abs ` c0)∈ ℝ, (normop ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  abscl(c0)
  ax-mp((normop ` c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ BndLinOp)

  remulcl((abs ` c0), (normop ` c1))
  elbdop2((c0[.op]c1))
}

  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), chba), wcel(cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cr))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), chba), wcel(cv(s0), chba)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s3), cmv, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)

} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, chba, wbr(cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))))))

  rspcev(s0, c3, cr, wral(s1, chba, wbr(cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1))))), wral(s1, chba, wbr(cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1))))))
  ralbidv(s1, chba, wceq(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))), wbr(cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))))

blocks.name: lnopconi
blocks.content: A condition equivalent to " ` T ` is continuous" when ` T ` is linear. Theorem 3.5(iii) of [Beran] p. 99. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopconi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccop), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wcel(c0, clo)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  lnconi(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, ccop, cno, cfv(cnop, c0), cmv)
  mpan(wcel(c0, ccop), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wcel(c0, clo))
  nmcopex(c0)
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, ccop), wcel(cv(s1), chba), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, clo))
  nmcoplb(c0, cv(s1))
  mpbiran(wcel(c0, ccop), wral(s0, chba, wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s1, crp, wral(hs1, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs1), cmv, cv(s0))), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(hs0))))))), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  elcnop(s0, hs0, s1, hs1, c0)
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), chba), wcel(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), chba))
  ffvelrni(cv(s1), chba, c0, chba)
  lnopfi(c0)
  normcl(cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  lnopsubi(cv(hs1), cv(s0), c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cno.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnop, c0)
  diff.cnop.s(s0)
  diff.ccop.s(s1)
  diff.cno.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cnop, c0)
  diff.cnop.s(s1)
  diff.cmv.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cno)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cno)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm lnopconi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ContOp ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ LinOp
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  lnconi(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, ccop, cno, (normop ` c0), cmv)
  mpan(c0 ∈ ContOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ LinOp)
  nmcopex(c0)
  mp3an1(c0 ∈ ContOp, s1 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` s1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` s1)), c0 ∈ LinOp)
  nmcoplb(c0, s1)
  mpbiran(c0 ∈ ContOp, ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,((normh `(hs1[-h]s0))[<]s1 →(normh `((c0 ` hs1)[-h](c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0))))), (c0 : ~H → ~H))
  elcnop(s0, hs0, s1, hs1, c0)
  syl(s1 ∈ ~H, (normh `(c0 ` s1))∈ ℝ, (c0 ` s1)∈ ~H)
  ffvelrni(s1, chba, c0, chba)
  lnopfi(c0)
  normcl((c0 ` s1))
  lnopsubi(hs1, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cno.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnop, c0)
  diff.cnop.s(s0)
  diff.ccop.s(s1)
  diff.cno.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cnop, c0)
  diff.cnop.s(s1)
  diff.cmv.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cno)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cno)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  bibi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, clo))), wcel(c0, ccop), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, clo)), ccop), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, clo)), cv(s1))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))))))

  fveq2d(cno, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, clo)), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, clo))))
  fveq1(c0, cif(c0, cres(cid, chba), wcel(c0, clo)), cv(s1))

thm lnopcon(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LinOp →(c0 ∈ ContOp ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1))))))

} = {
  dedth(c0, (= |` ~H), c0 ∈ LinOp, (c0 ∈ ContOp ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1))))), (if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))∈ ContOp ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(normh `(if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1))))))
  bibi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)), c0 ∈ ContOp, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))), if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))∈ ContOp, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(normh `(if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))))
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)), ccop)
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, cr, chba, c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)), (normh `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)), (normh `(if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))
  breq1d((normh `(c0 ` s1)), cle, (s0[×](normh ` s1)), (normh `(if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))` s1)), c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)))
  fveq2d(cno, (c0 ` s1), (if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H))` s1), c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)))
  fveq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)), s1)
  lnopconi(s0, s1, if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)))
  elimel(c0, clo, (= |` ~H))
  idlnop()
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, if(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0,(= |` ~H)))

  diff.cres.s(s1, cid, chba)
