blocks.name: lnopcnbd
blocks.content: A linear operator is continuous iff it is bounded. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnopcnbd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clo), wb(wcel(c0, ccop), wcel(c0, cbo)))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c0, ccop), wcel(c0, cbo))
  sylibd(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c0, ccop), wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr))
  ex(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c0, ccop), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr))
  nmcopex(c0)
  baibr(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wcel(c0, cbo))
  elbdop2(c0)
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, ccop), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cbo), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))))
  nmopre(c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, wcel(c0, cbo), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))
  nmbdoplb(c0, cv(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, cfv(cnop, c0), cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))))
  ralbidv(hs0, chba, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnop, c0)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))
  breq2d(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnop, c0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))
  lnopcon(hs1, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cbo))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cnop, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnop, c0)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm lnopcnbd(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LinOp →(c0 ∈ ContOp ↔ c0 ∈ BndLinOp))
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0 ∈ ContOp, c0 ∈ BndLinOp)
  sylibd(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0 ∈ ContOp, c0 ∈ BndLinOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  ex(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0 ∈ ContOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  nmcopex(c0)
  baibr(c0 ∈ LinOp, (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ BndLinOp)
  elbdop2(c0)
  syl5ibr(c0 ∈ LinOp, c0 ∈ BndLinOp, c0 ∈ ContOp, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)))))
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ BndLinOp, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)))), (normop ` c0)∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0))))
  nmopre(c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, c0 ∈ BndLinOp, (normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)))
  nmbdoplb(c0, hs0)
  rspcev(hs1, (normop ` c0), cr, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0))))
  ralbidv(hs0, chba, hs1 =(normop ` c0), (normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)), (normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)))
  breq2d((normh `(c0 ` hs0)), cle, (hs1[×](normh ` hs0)), ((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)), hs1 =(normop ` c0))
  oveq1(hs1, (normop ` c0), cmul, (normh ` hs0))
  lnopcon(hs1, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ BndLinOp)
  diff.hs1.c((normop ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normop ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0))))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 =(normop ` c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: lncnopbd
blocks.content: A continuous linear operator is a bounded linear operator. This theorem justifies our use of "bounded linear" as an interchangeable condition for "continuous linear" used in some textbook proofs. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lncnbd
blocks.content: A continuous linear operator is a bounded linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnopcnre
blocks.content: A linear operator is continuous iff it is bounded. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnfnli
blocks.content: Basic property of a linear Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnfnfi
blocks.content: A linear Hilbert space functional is a functional. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: lnfn0i
blocks.content: The value of a linear Hilbert space functional at zero is zero. Remark in [Beran] p. 99. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  oveq1i(cfv(c0, c0v), cmin, cfv(c0, c0v), co(cfv(c0, c0v), caddc, cfv(c0, c0v)))
  eqtr3i(cfv(c0, c0v), co(cfv(c0, c0v), caddc, cfv(c0, c0v)), co(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c0, c0v)), caddc, cfv(c0, c0v)))
  eqtr3i(co(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c0, c0v)), caddc, cfv(c0, c0v)), cfv(c0, c0v), cfv(c0, co(co(nat1, csm, c0v), cva, c0v)))
  mp3an(wceq(cfv(c0, co(co(nat1, csm, c0v), cva, c0v)), co(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c0, c0v)), caddc, cfv(c0, c0v))), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(c0v, chba), wcel(c0v, chba))
  lnfnli(nat1, c0v, c0v, c0)
  fveq2i(c0, co(co(nat1, csm, c0v), cva, c0v), c0v)

  ax-mp(wceq(co(co(nat1, csm, c0v), cva, c0v), co(nat1, csm, c0v)), wcel(co(nat1, csm, c0v), chba))

thm lnfnaddi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), caddc, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, clf)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), caddc, cfv(c2, c1)), cfv(c2, co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1)), co(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c2, c0)), caddc, cfv(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(c2, co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1)), co(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c2, c0)), caddc, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  lnfnli(nat1, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(c2, co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1)), cfv(c2, co(c0, cva, c1))))
  fvoveq1d(c2, co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, c1, c0, wcel(c0, chba))
  ax-hvmulid(c0)
  oveq1d(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c2, c0)), caddc, cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c2, c0)), cfv(c2, c0)))
  mulid2d(cfv(c2, c0), wcel(c0, chba))
  ffvelrni(c0, chba, c2, cc)
  lnfnfi(c2)
}

blocks.name: lnfnmuli
blocks.content: Multiplicative property of a linear Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm lnfnmuli(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(c0, csm, c1)), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1))))

} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c2, co(c0, csm, c1)), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), cfv(c2, co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, c0v)), co(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), caddc, cfv(c2, c0v)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba)))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(c2, co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, c0v)), co(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), caddc, cfv(c2, c0v))), wcel(c0v, chba))
  ax-hv0cl()
  lnfnli(c0, c1, c0v, c2)
  fveq2d(c2, co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, c0v), co(c0, csm, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, c0v), co(c0, csm, c1)), wcel(co(c0, csm, c1), chba))
  hvmulcl(c0, c1)
  ax-hvaddid(co(c0, csm, c1))
  syl5eq(co(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), caddc, cfv(c2, c0v)), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), caddc, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba)))
  oveq2i(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), caddc, cfv(c2, c0v), nat0)
  lnfn0i(c2)
  addid1d(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cfv(c2, c1)), cc), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cc))
  ffvelrni(c1, chba, c2, cc)
  lnfnfi(c2)

blocks.name: lnfnaddmuli
blocks.content: Sum/product property of a linear Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnfnaddmuli(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, cfv(c3, c2)))))
  -| wcel(c3, clf)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, cfv(c3, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))))
  3impb(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, chba), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c1, cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), co(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)))), wcel(co(c0, csm, c2), chba))
  hvmulcl(c0, c2)
  lnfnaddi(c1, co(c0, csm, c2), c3)
  oveq2d(cfv(c3, c1), caddc, cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(c3, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(c0, cmul, cfv(c3, c2))))
  lnfnmuli(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: lnfnsubi
blocks.content: Subtraction property for a linear Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnfnsubi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(c0, cmv, c1)), co(cfv(c2, c0), cmin, cfv(c2, c1))))

blocks.name: lnfn0
blocks.content: The value of a linear Hilbert space functional at zero is zero. Remark in [Beran] p. 99. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nmcfnex(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(c0, ccnfn)), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr))
} = {

  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, cxp(chba, csn(nat0)), wcel(c0, cin(clf, ccnfn))), cnmf)

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LinFn →(c0 ∈ ContFn ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  dedth(c0, (~H × { 0 }), c0 ∈ LinFn, (c0 ∈ ContFn ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1))))), (if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))∈ ContFn ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(abs `(if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1))))))
  bibi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })), c0 ∈ ContFn, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))), if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))∈ ContFn, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ~H,(abs `(if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))))
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })), ccnfn)
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, cr, chba, c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })), (abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)), (abs `(if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))` s1))[≤](s0[×](normh ` s1)))
  breq1d((abs `(c0 ` s1)), cle, (s0[×](normh ` s1)), (abs `(if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))` s1)), c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })))
  fveq2d(cabs, (c0 ` s1), (if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 }))` s1), c0 = if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })))
  fveq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })), s1)
  lnfnconi(s0, s1, if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })))
  elimel(c0, clf, (~H × { 0 }))
  0lnfn()
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, if(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0,(~H × { 0 })))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, (~H × { 0 }), c0 ∈ LinFn)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, chba, { 0 })
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, clf)
  diff.clf.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s1, c0, (~H × { 0 }), c0 ∈ LinFn)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, chba, { 0 })
  diff.chba.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, clf)
  diff.clf.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: lnfncnbd
blocks.content: A linear functional is continuous iff it is bounded. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm lnfncnbd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clf), wb(wcel(c0, ccnfn), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr)))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(c0, ccnfn), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr))
  ex(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(c0, ccnfn), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr))
  nmcfnex(c0)
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr), wcel(c0, ccnfn), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))))
  ex(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr)), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr), wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr))
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, wa(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))
  nmbdfnlb(c0, cv(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, cfv(cnmf, c0), cr, wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))))
  ralbidv(hs0, chba, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnmf, c0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))))
  breq2d(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnmf, c0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))
  lnfncon(hs1, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, clf), wcel(cfv(cnmf, c0), cr)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cnmf, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(hs0, chba, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cfv(cnmf, c0), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnmf, c0)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm lnfncnbd(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LinFn →(c0 ∈ ContFn ↔(normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ))
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0 ∈ ContFn, (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  ex(c0 ∈ LinFn, c0 ∈ ContFn, (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  nmcfnex(c0)
  sylibrd(c0 ∈ LinFn, (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ContFn, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)))))
  ex(c0 ∈ LinFn, (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)))))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ LinFn ∧(normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)))), (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0))))
  simpr(c0 ∈ LinFn, (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, (c0 ∈ LinFn ∧(normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ), (abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)))
  3expa(c0 ∈ LinFn, (normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ~H, (abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)))
  nmbdfnlb(c0, hs0)
  rspcev(hs1, (normfn ` c0), cr, ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0))))
  ralbidv(hs0, chba, hs1 =(normfn ` c0), (abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](hs1[×](normh ` hs0)), (abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)))
  breq2d((abs `(c0 ` hs0)), cle, (hs1[×](normh ` hs0)), ((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0)), hs1 =(normfn ` c0))
  oveq1(hs1, (normfn ` c0), cmul, (normh ` hs0))
  lnfncon(hs1, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ LinFn ∧(normfn ` c0)∈ ℝ))
  diff.hs1.c((normfn ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,(abs `(c0 ` hs0))[≤]((normfn ` c0)[×](normh ` hs0))))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 =(normfn ` c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: imaelshi
blocks.content: The image of a subspace under a linear operator is a subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm imaelshi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(cima(c0, c1), csh)
  -| wcel(c0, clo)
  -| wcel(c1, csh)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(cima(c0, c1), csh), wa(wss(cima(c0, c1), chba), wcel(c0v, cima(c0, c1))), wa(wral(hs0, cima(c0, c1), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))))
  pm3.2i(wss(cima(c0, c1), chba), wcel(c0v, cima(c0, c1)))
  sstri(cima(c0, c1), chba, crn(c0))
  imassrn(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wss(crn(c0), chba), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  frn(c0, chba, chba)
  eqeltrri(c0v, cima(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c0v))
  lnop0i(c0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(c0v, c1))
  ax-mp(wcel(c0v, c1), wcel(c1, csh))
  sh0(c1)
  mp2an(wi(wcel(c0v, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c0v), cima(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  funfvima2(c0, c1, c0v)
  pm3.2i(wral(hs0, cima(c0, c1), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))))
  mprgbir(hs2, c1, wral(hs0, cima(c0, c1), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))
  mp2an(wb(wral(hs0, cima(c0, c1), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))), wral(hs2, c1, wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))), wfn(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba))
  ralima(hs0, hs2, c0, chba, c1, wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))
  ralbidv(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs2))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))), wral(hs3, c1, wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs3, c1, wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))
  eqeltrrd(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3)))), wcel(cv(hs2), chba), wcel(cv(hs3), chba))
  sheli(cv(hs2), c1)
  lnopaddi(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3)), c1))
  mp3an1(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(c1, csh))
  shaddcl(c1, cv(hs2), cv(hs3))
  mp2an(wi(wcel(co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  funfvima2(c0, c1, co(cv(hs2), cva, cv(hs3)))
  mp2an(wb(wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))), wral(hs3, c1, wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))), wfn(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba))
  ralima(hs1, hs3, c0, chba, c1, wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))
  eleq1d(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs3))))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs3)), cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva)
  rgen(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))), wral(hs3, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs3, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))
  eqeltrrd(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3))), co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3)))), wcel(cv(hs3), chba))
  sheli(cv(hs3), c1)
  lnopmuli(cv(hs0), cv(hs3), c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3)), c1))
  mp3an1(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(c1, csh))
  shmulcl(c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs3))
  mp2an(wi(wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ax-mp(wfun(c0), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  ffun(c0, chba, chba)
  sseqtr4i(c1, cdm(c0), chba)
  fdmi(c0, chba, chba)
  funfvima2(c0, c1, co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs3)))
  mp2an(wb(wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))), wral(hs3, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))), wfn(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba))
  ax-mp(wfn(c0, chba), wf(c0, chba, chba))
  lnopfi(c0)
  ffn(c0, chba, chba)
  shssii(c1)
  ralima(hs1, hs3, c0, chba, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs3))))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), csm)
  issh2(hs0, hs1, cima(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(chba)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs2.w(wral(hs1, cima(c0, c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs2))))
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(chba)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cva, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cfv(c0, cv(hs3))), cima(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), cima(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cima(c0, c1))

thm imaelshi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 " c1)∈ SH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ LinOp
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
} = {
  mpbir2an((c0 " c1)∈ SH, ((c0 " c1)⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈(c0 " c1)), (∀(hs0 ∈(c0 " c1), ∀(hs1 ∈(c0 " c1),(hs0[+h]hs1)∈(c0 " c1)))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈(c0 " c1),(hs0[.h]hs1)∈(c0 " c1)))))
  pm3.2i((c0 " c1)⊆ ~H, 0h ∈(c0 " c1))
  sstri((c0 " c1), chba, ran(c0))
  imassrn(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(ran(c0)⊆ ~H, (c0 : ~H → ~H))
  frn(c0, chba, chba)
  eqeltrri(c0v, (c0 " c1), (c0 ` 0h))
  lnop0i(c0)
  ax-mp((c0 ` 0h)∈(c0 " c1), 0h ∈ c1)
  ax-mp(0h ∈ c1, c1 ∈ SH)
  sh0(c1)
